Reviews.Title: Needed - should have been there from the outset
Reviews.Author: tip184
Reviews.Content: I've owned my Lytro since last spring - it is an amazing camera as I indicated in my review of that product. This tripod adapter works well: it slips over the body of the camera and is locked in place by the tripod mounting screw.  In my opinion a tripod mount should have been built into the camera from the outset.I see two problems with this:1. It is not clear where on the camera it should be placed.  My Lytro now has small scratches in the finish from this adapter - might not have happened if the adapter was placed on the rubber grip, but this would have been a tight fit (if it was even possible).  No instruction sheet to suggest placement.2. I am concerned about possibly damaging the internals of the camera when I tighten the tripod mounting screw.  Again, some instructions - suggesting either where to place the adapter or assuring me that damage would not occur - would have been welcome.Considering that this is the only way to use the Lytro with a tripod, it is hard not to rate it highly.

Reviews.Title: good engineering
Reviews.Author: tergiam
Reviews.Content: Works just the way it's supposed to.  The method of clamping on to the camera body is new to me and it works very well.  Care must be excercised to not use too long a thumb screw.  If your thumb screws are too long, shim them with washer(s). You only want  about three and a half threads to engage the clamping mechanism nut.

Reviews.Title: Interesting accessory to attach the camera to a tripod.
Reviews.Author: Jauvane C. de Oliveira "JVc"
Reviews.Content: This is a must have if you wish to use your Lytro camera in a tripod or other accessory that uses the same tripod mount. The camera slides in easily. When you tighten the tripod screw the accessory tightens around the camera. nicely designed!

Reviews.Title: It works, why doesnt the darn camera have the mounting hole in it?
Reviews.Author: Bud_Dude
Reviews.Content: This item works as advertised, sort of... it's a little loose and the camera will probably slide out of it if pointed downward. All in all, it's disappointing that the camera doesn't come with the 1/4-20 mounting hole in it like just about every other camera ever made. I look at it as a form of forced upgrade from Lytro....

Reviews.Title: Beautiful.
Reviews.Author: G. Howell
Reviews.Content: A lovely object with a purpose.  In keeping with the chic and simple Lytro camera.  And, by the way, it's aluminum - which doesn't show in the advertising photo.  Very nice.

Reviews.Title: Solid and simple
Reviews.Author: Knight of Cydonia
Reviews.Content: Bought one of these for my Lytro, wasn't disappointed. Solid build with a simple size make this an easy accy to carry in the bag with the camera.

Reviews.Title: Elegant!
Reviews.Author: Brian P. Lawler
Reviews.Content: This is a lovely piece of engineering. It fits the camera nicely, and maintains the classy look of all things Lytro.
